name: Chocolate Chip cookies
instructions: Melt the butter untill browned
Mix with the sugars
Cool a little bit and mix everything else
let rest in the fridge for 1-24 hours
Divide into 35g balls
Bake in a Preheated oven to 190c for 10 minutes

name: Dinner Rolls
instructions: Mix the 120g water with the 30g flour and heat in a pan to create a roux (called tangzhong)
Mix everything except the salt and the butter in a stand mixer for 10 minutes
Add the salt and butter and mix for 5 minutes
Let rise in the counter for 1 hour or in the fridge for 24 hours
Divide the dough to 12 balls, and let them rise in a 42 inch cake pan for 45-60 minutes
Prehat the oven to 190c, When hot brush the rolls with egg and bake for 25-30 minutes (or untill 190 fahrenheit internally)

name: Pizza
instructions: To make the poolish: take 150 grams of water and flour, mix with a pinch of yeast and let rise in the counter for 12-16 hours
Mix everything except the salt and the oil in a stand mixer for 10 minutes
Add the salt and oil and mix for 6 minutes
Let rise in the counter for 1 hour or in the fridge for 24-48 hours
Divide the dough to 180g balls, and let them rise for 45-60 minutes
Turn the oven on broiler to his max temperature
When you are ready to make the pizza, flatten the dough ball, put on a hot pan and out tomato sauce and cheese
When the pizza is brown in the bottom move it with the pan to the hot oven and let it broil for 4-5 minutes.
